member.name: T:AForge.Neuro.BipolarSigmoidFunction
member.remarks:
The class represents bipolar sigmoid activation function with the next expression:
2 f(x) = ------------------ - 1 1 + exp(-alpha * x)
2 * alpha * exp(-alpha * x ) f'(x) = -------------------------------- = alpha * (1 - f(x)^2) / 2 (1 + exp(-alpha * x))^2
Output range of the function: [-1, 1]
Functions graph:

member.name: P:AForge.Neuro.BipolarSigmoidFunction.Alpha
member.remarks: The value determines steepness of the function. Default value: 2.

member.name: M:AForge.Neuro.BipolarSigmoidFunction.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class

member.name: M:AForge.Neuro.BipolarSigmoidFunction.#ctor(System.Double)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class

member.name: M:AForge.Neuro.BipolarSigmoidFunction.Function(System.Double)
member.remarks: The method calculates function value at point x.

member.name: M:AForge.Neuro.BipolarSigmoidFunction.Derivative(System.Double)
member.remarks: The method calculates function derivative at point x.

member.name: M:AForge.Neuro.BipolarSigmoidFunction.Derivative2(System.Double)
member.param: Function output value - the value, which was obtained with the help of method
member.remarks: The method calculates the same derivative value as the method, but it takes not the input x value itself, but the function value, which was calculated previously with the help of method. (Some applications require as function value, as derivative value, so they can seve the amount of calculations using this method to calculate derivative)

member.name: T:AForge.Neuro.IActivationFunction
member.remarks: All activation functions, which are supposed to be used with neurons, which calculate their output as a function of weighted sum of their inputs, should implement this interfaces.

member.name: M:AForge.Neuro.IActivationFunction.Function(System.Double)
member.remarks: The method calculates function value at point x.

member.name: M:AForge.Neuro.IActivationFunction.Derivative(System.Double)
member.remarks: The method calculates function derivative at point x.

member.name: M:AForge.Neuro.IActivationFunction.Derivative2(System.Double)
member.param: Function output value - the value, which was obtained with the help of method
member.remarks: The method calculates the same derivative value as the method, but it takes not the input x value itself, but the function value, which was calculated previously with the help of method. (Some applications require as function value, as derivative value, so they can seve the amount of calculations using this method to calculate derivative)

member.name: T:AForge.Neuro.SigmoidFunction
member.remarks:
The class represents sigmoid activation function with the next expression:
1 f(x) = ------------------ 1 + exp(-alpha * x)
alpha * exp(-alpha * x ) f'(x) = ---------------------------- = alpha * f(x) * (1 - f(x)) (1 + exp(-alpha * x))^2
Output range of the function: [0, 1]
Functions graph:

member.name: P:AForge.Neuro.SigmoidFunction.Alpha
member.remarks: The value determines steepness of the function. Default value: 2.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class

member.name: M:AForge.Neuro.SigmoidFunction.#ctor(System.Double)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class

member.name: M:AForge.Neuro.SigmoidFunction.Function(System.Double)
member.remarks: The method calculates function value at point x.

member.name: M:AForge.Neuro.SigmoidFunction.Derivative(System.Double)
member.remarks: The method calculates function derivative at point x.

member.name: M:AForge.Neuro.SigmoidFunction.Derivative2(System.Double)
member.param: Function output value - the value, which was obtained with the help of method
member.remarks: The method calculates the same derivative value as the method, but it takes not the input x value itself, but the function value, which was calculated previously with the help of method. (Some applications require as function value, as derivative value, so they can seve the amount of calculations using this method to calculate derivative)

member.name: T:AForge.Neuro.ThresholdFunction
member.remarks:
The class represents threshold activation function with the next expression:
f(x) = 1, if x >= 0, otherwise 0
Output range of the function: [0, 1]
Functions graph:

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class

member.name: M:AForge.Neuro.ThresholdFunction.Function(System.Double)
member.remarks: The method calculates function value at point x.

member.name: M:AForge.Neuro.ThresholdFunction.Derivative(System.Double)
member.remarks: The method is not supported, because it is not possible to calculate derivative of the function.

member.name: M:AForge.Neuro.ThresholdFunction.Derivative2(System.Double)
member.remarks: The method is not supported, because it is not possible to calculate derivative of the function.

member.remarks: Randomizes layer's neurons by calling method of each neuron.

member.name: T:AForge.Neuro.Learning.BackPropagationLearning
member.remarks: The class implements back propagation learning algorithm, which is widely used for training multi-layer neural networks with continuous activation functions.

member.name: P:AForge.Neuro.Learning.BackPropagationLearning.LearningRate
member.remarks: The value determines speed of learning. Default value equals to 0.1.

member.name: P:AForge.Neuro.Learning.BackPropagationLearning.Momentum
member.remarks:
The value determines the portion of previous weight's update to use on current iteration. Weight's update values are calculated on each iteration depending on neuron's error. The momentum specifies the amount of update to use from previous iteration and the amount of update to use from current iteration. If the value is equal to 0.1, for example, then 0.1 portion of previous update and 0.9 portion of current update are used to update weight's value.
Default value equals to 0.0.

member.name: M:AForge.Neuro.Learning.BackPropagationLearning.#ctor(AForge.Neuro.ActivationNetwork)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class

member.name: M:AForge.Neuro.Learning.BackPropagationLearning.Run(System.Double[],System.Double[])
member.returns: Returns squared error of the last layer divided by 2
member.remarks: Runs one learning iteration and updates neuron's weights.

member.name: M:AForge.Neuro.Learning.BackPropagationLearning.RunEpoch(System.Double[][],System.Double[][])
member.returns: Returns sum of squared errors of the last layer divided by 2
member.remarks: Runs series of learning iterations - one iteration for each input sample. Updates neuron's weights after each sample presented.

member.name: M:AForge.Neuro.Learning.BackPropagationLearning.CalculateError(System.Double[])
member.summary: Calculates error values for all neurons of the network
member.returns: Returns summary squared error of the last layer divided by 2

member.name: T:AForge.Neuro.Learning.DeltaRuleLearning
member.remarks: This learning algorithm is used to train one layer neural network of Activation Neurons with continuous activation function, see for example.

member.name: P:AForge.Neuro.Learning.DeltaRuleLearning.LearningRate
member.remarks: The value determines speed of learning in the range of [0, 1]. Default value equals to 0.1.

member.name: M:AForge.Neuro.Learning.DeltaRuleLearning.#ctor(AForge.Neuro.ActivationNetwork)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class

member.name: M:AForge.Neuro.Learning.DeltaRuleLearning.Run(System.Double[],System.Double[])
member.remarks: Runs one learning iteration and updates neuron's weights.

member.name: M:AForge.Neuro.Learning.DeltaRuleLearning.RunEpoch(System.Double[][],System.Double[][])
member.returns: Returns sum of squared errors divided by 2
member.remarks: Runs series of learning iterations - one iteration for each input sample. Updates neuron's weights after each sample presented.

member.name: T:AForge.Neuro.Learning.ElasticNetworkLearning
member.remarks: This class implements elastic network's learning algorithm and allows to train Distance Networks.

member.name: P:AForge.Neuro.Learning.ElasticNetworkLearning.LearningRate
member.remarks: Determines speed of learning. Value range is [0, 1]. Default value equals to 0.1.

member.name: P:AForge.Neuro.Learning.ElasticNetworkLearning.LearningRadius
member.remarks:
Determines the amount of neurons to be updated around winner neuron. Neurons, which are in the circle of specified radius, are updated during the learning procedure. Neurons, which are closer to the winner neuron, get more update.
Default value equals to 0.5.

member.name: M:AForge.Neuro.Learning.ElasticNetworkLearning.#ctor(AForge.Neuro.DistanceNetwork)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class

member.name: M:AForge.Neuro.Learning.ElasticNetworkLearning.Run(System.Double[])
member.returns: Returns learning error - summary absolute difference between updated weights and according inputs. The difference is measured according to the neurons distance to the winner neuron.

member.name: M:AForge.Neuro.Learning.ElasticNetworkLearning.RunEpoch(System.Double[][])
member.returns: Returns summary learning error for the epoch. See method for details about learning error calculation.

member.name: T:AForge.Neuro.Learning.ISupervisedLearning
member.remarks: The interface describes methods, which should be implemented by all supervised learning algorithms. Supervised learning is such a type of learning algorithms, where system's desired output is known on the learning stage. So, given sample input values and desired outputs, system should adopt its internals to produce correct (or closer to correct) result after the learning step is complete.

member.name: T:AForge.Neuro.Learning.IUnsupervisedLearning
member.remarks: The interface describes methods, which should be implemented by all unsupervised learning algorithms. Unsupervised learning is such a type of learning algorithms, where system's desired output is not known on the learning stage. Given sample input values, it is expected, that system will organize itself in the way to find similarities betweed provided samples.

member.name: T:AForge.Neuro.Learning.PerceptronLearning
member.remarks: This learning algorithm is used to train one layer neural network of Activation Neurons with the Threshold activation function.

member.name: P:AForge.Neuro.Learning.PerceptronLearning.LearningRate
member.remarks: The value determines speed of learning in the range of [0, 1]. Default value equals to 0.1.

member.name: M:AForge.Neuro.Learning.PerceptronLearning.#ctor(AForge.Neuro.ActivationNetwork)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class

member.name: M:AForge.Neuro.Learning.PerceptronLearning.Run(System.Double[],System.Double[])
member.returns: Returns absolute error - difference between real output and desired output
member.remarks: Runs one learning iteration and updates neuron's weights in case if neuron's output does not equal to the desired output.

member.name: M:AForge.Neuro.Learning.PerceptronLearning.RunEpoch(System.Double[][],System.Double[][])
T:AForge.Neuro.Learning.SOMLearning
member.summary: Kohonen Self Organizing Map (SOM) learning algorithm
member.remarks: This class implements Kohonen's SOM learning algorithm and is widel√≠ used in clusterization tasks. The class allows to train Distance Networks.

member.name: P:AForge.Neuro.Learning.SOMLearning.LearningRate
member.remarks: Determines speed of learning. Value range is [0, 1]. Default value equals to 0.1.

member.name: P:AForge.Neuro.Learning.SOMLearning.LearningRadius
member.remarks:
Determines the amount of neurons to be updated around winner neuron. Neurons, which are in the circle of specified radius, are updated during the learning procedure. Neurons, which are closer to the winner neuron, get more update.
Default value equals to 7.

member.name: M:AForge.Neuro.Learning.SOMLearning.#ctor(AForge.Neuro.DistanceNetwork)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class
member.remarks: This constructor supposes that a square network will be passed for training - it should be possible to get square root of network's neurons amount.

member.name: M:AForge.Neuro.Learning.SOMLearning.#ctor(AForge.Neuro.DistanceNetwork,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class
member.remarks: The constructor allows to pass network of arbitrary rectangular shape. The amount of neurons in the network should be equal to width * height.

member.name: M:AForge.Neuro.Learning.SOMLearning.Run(System.Double[])
member.returns: Returns learning error - summary absolute difference between updated weights and according inputs. The difference is measured according to the neurons distance to the winner neuron.

member.name: M:AForge.Neuro.Learning.SOMLearning.RunEpoch(System.Double[][])
member.returns: Returns summary learning error for the epoch. See method for details about learning error calculation.

member.name: T:AForge.Neuro.ActivationNetwork
member.remarks: Activation network is a base for multi-layer neural network with activation functions. It consists of activation layers.

member.name: P:AForge.Neuro.ActivationNetwork.Item(System.Int32)
member.remarks: Allows to access network's layer.

member.name: M:AForge.Neuro.ActivationNetwork.#ctor(AForge.Neuro.IActivationFunction,System.Int32,System.Int32[])
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class
member.param: Activation function of neurons of the network
Array, which specifies the amount of neurons in each layer of the neural network
member.remarks: The new network will be randomized (see method) after it is created.
member.example:
The following sample illustrates the usage of ActivationNetwork class:
// create activation network ActivationNetwork network = new ActivationNetwork( new SigmoidFunction( ), // sigmoid activation function 3, // 3 inputs 4, 1 ); // 2 layers: // 4 neurons in the firs layer // 1 neuron in the second layer

member.name: T:AForge.Neuro.DistanceNetwork
member.remarks: Distance network is a neural network of only one distance layer. The network is a base for such neural networks as SOM, Elastic net, etc.

member.name: P:AForge.Neuro.DistanceNetwork.Item(System.Int32)
member.remarks: Allows to access network's layer.

member.name: M:AForge.Neuro.DistanceNetwork.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class
member.remarks: The new network will be randomized (see method) after it is created.

member.name: M:AForge.Neuro.DistanceNetwork.GetWinner
member.remarks: The method returns index of the neuron, which weights have the minimum distance from network's input.

member.remarks: The calculation way of network's output vector is determined by inherited class.

member.summary: Compute output vector of the network

member.name: M:AForge.Neuro.Network.Randomize
member.remarks: Randomizes network's layers by calling method of each layer.

member.name: T:AForge.Neuro.ActivationNeuron
member.remarks: Activation neuron computes weighted sum of its inputs, adds threshold value and then applies activation function. The neuron is usually used in multi-layer neural networks.

member.name: F:AForge.Neuro.ActivationNeuron.threshold
member.remarks: The value is added to inputs weighted sum.

member.name: F:AForge.Neuro.ActivationNeuron.function
member.remarks: The function is applied to inputs weighted sum plus threshold value.

member.name: P:AForge.Neuro.ActivationNeuron.Threshold
member.remarks: The value is added to inputs weighted sum.

member.name: M:AForge.Neuro.ActivationNeuron.#ctor(System.Int32,AForge.Neuro.IActivationFunction)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class

member.name: M:AForge.Neuro.ActivationNeuron.Randomize
member.remarks: Calls base class Randomize method to randomize neuron's weights and then randomize threshold's value.

member.name: M:AForge.Neuro.ActivationNeuron.Compute(System.Double[])
member.remarks: The output value of activation neuron is equal to value of nueron's activation function, which parameter is weighted sum of its inputs plus threshold value. The output value is also stored in Output property.

member.name: T:AForge.Neuro.DistanceNeuron
member.remarks: Distance neuron computes its output as distance between its weights and inputs. The neuron is usually used in Kohonen Self Organizing Map.

member.name: M:AForge.Neuro.DistanceNeuron.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class

member.name: M:AForge.Neuro.DistanceNeuron.Compute(System.Double[])
member.returns: The output value of distance neuron is equal to distance between its weights and inputs - sum of absolute differences. The output value is also stored in Output property.

member.name: T:AForge.Neuro.Neuron
member.remarks: This is a base neuron class, which encapsulates such common properties, like neuron's input, output and weights.

member.name: F:AForge.Neuro.Neuron.rand
member.remarks: The generator is used for neuron's weights randomization

member.name: F:AForge.Neuro.Neuron.randRange
member.remarks: Sets the range of random generator. Affects initial values of neuron's weight. Default value is [0, 1].

member.name: P:AForge.Neuro.Neuron.RandGenerator
member.remarks: The property allows to initialize random generator with a custom seed. The generator is used for neuron's weights randomization.
